named-query.name: READ_FIVE_CARD_BY_TYPE_AND_STATUS
named-query.query: SELECT fivecard FROM com.cdfamedy.core.domain.FiveCard fivecard WHERE fivecard.status=:status AND fivecard.type=:type

named-query.name: READ_AVAILABLE_FIVE_CARD_QUANTITY_BY_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(fivecard) FROM com.cdfamedy.core.domain.FiveCard fivecard WHERE fivecard.type=:type AND fivecard.status=:status

named-query.name: READ_FIVE_CARD_TOTAL_QUANTITY_BY_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(fivecard) FROM com.cdfamedy.core.domain.FiveCard fivecard WHERE fivecard.type=:type
